attributes.action: Theory test to be longer than 2 years during covid back log
attributes.additional_details: Email and extension from everyone who passed their theory in 2020 from covid.
attributes.background: Extend the two year theory tests to people who have passed from 2020. As covid hit and there has been a massive amount of back log to get test. Having the stress of when finding a test you HAVE to pass first time otherwise it’ll run out, it’s unfair now.
